trans-unit.source: Provides information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"></xref> event that occurs when a user drags a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control with the mouse..
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragStartedEventArgs"></xref> class.
The horizontal offset of the mouse click with respect to the screen coordinates of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
The vertical offset of the mouse click with respect to the screen coordinates of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
Gets the horizontal offset of the mouse click relative to the screen coordinates of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
The horizontal offset of the mouse click with respect to the upper-left corner of the bounding box of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.

Converts a method that handles the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragStarted"></xref> event to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragStartedEventHandler"></xref> type.
This implementation casts the `genericHandler` as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragStartedEventHandler>.
Gets the vertical offset of the mouse click relative to the screen coordinates of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
The horizontal offset of the mouse click with respect to the upper-left corner of the bounding box of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>.
